name: Horror Maze (Artic Wolf Games)
description:
Navigate your way through a series of terrifying mazes, solo or split screen.

 Will you get out alive?

Maps Included:

School

Asylum

Isolation

Crawl Space

Boneyard

Carnival

Artic Terror

The Sewer

And a few bonus maps under the "Extras" Category 

The Crow (Original Concept)

The Terror Maze


Video game developed by two passionate people using the Unreal Engine.
To play Split Screen CO-OP Simply connect a controller to your PC
